document.full_text: marine le pen's far-right national front gave french president nicolas sarkozy's conservatives a fright on sunday, snapping at the heels of the mainstream center-right in poorly attended local elections.
document.title: sarkozy suffers poll setback as far-right closes in
lines_and_colors: marine le pen's far-right national front gave french president nicolas sarkozy's conservatives a fright on sunday, snapping at the heels of the mainstream center-right in poorly attended local elections.
